desc: NEW PERSPECTIVES ON THE INTERNET has been updated to cover the newest software including Windows 7, Internet Explorer 8, Mozilla Firefox 3, and Google Chrome. With the New Perspectives critical-thinking, problem-solving approach, you will learn basic to advanced features of the Internet – from Browser Basics to Electronic Commerce.
title: New Perspectives on the Internet: Comprehensive (Available Titles Skills Assessment Manager (SAM) – Office 2007)
